sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Navigation from '../component/Navigation'; import MainBackground from '../../../shared/images/main-background.png'; import DownArrow from '../../../shared/images/down-arrow.png'; import Service00 from '../../../shared/images/service00.png'; import Service01 from '../../../shared/images/service01.png'; import Service02 from '../../../shared/images/service02.png'; import ButtonArrow from '../../../shared/images/button-arrow.png'; import Forum from '../forum/Forum'; import '../css/style.scss'; const Main = () => { return (

ELYFI :
Real asset liquidity protocol

ELYFI is an open source and non-custodial liquidity protocol
for earning interest on deposits and borrowing assets.

How It Works?

ELYFI Protocol allows the creation of fungible assets, “synthetics”, that track the price of real world assets.
ELYFI synthetics are intended to be used as key building blocks in smart contracts,
and to bring the world’s assets to the blockchain.

Blockchain

We can experience the cryptocurrency financial system through blockchain.
All our contracts work logically, and all our records are stored in the blockchain. "ELYFI" is a new DEFI protocol and a project that everyone can participate in.

Real Asset

"ELYFI" links real-world assets with cryptocurrency financial systems.
Real assets are clearly valuable and secure, but they have a number of limitations.
Blockchain brings real assets to cryptocurrency financial systems to help make transactions more convenient.

NFT

ELYFI creates a variety of contracts to connect reality with virtual currency financial systems.
These contracts are unique and must be trusted.
In this protocol, many contracts are created and managed as NFT(Non Fungible Token).

); } export default Main;
